QuestData.Title: Sea Legs
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $c. I am Erunak, a fellow survivor of this savagery.$b$bI'm afraid your travails have only just begun. The naga have been scouring these waters, attacking anyone that still lives.$b$bYou are not yet equipped to survive here, but I can remedy that.$b$bJust outside this ship live a special breed of starfish. Bring me some of them along with a conch shell. I'll prepare an enchantment that should help you grow accustomed to your environment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Saltwater Starfish and a Conch Shell from the Sea Floor at Legion's Fate.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to gather the items I requested, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Here you are, $c. With this you should find maneuvering in the sea to be nearly effortless. $b$bNow we must get to work. There is much to be done in little time.
